com.otb.utility.utils

Class LocationUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.otb.utility.utils.LocationUtils

  • public class LocationUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Mohit Rajput on 14/7/17. This class provides location related utility methods. It's a singleton class.

      • isLocationEnabled

        public boolean isLocationEnabled(android.content.Context context)
        It checks whether device's location is on or not.
        Parameters:
        context -
        Returns:
        true if device location is enabled, false otherwise.

      • getMyLocation

        public android.location.Location getMyLocation()
        Method finds the most accurate location of device and return it. It compares GPS and Network provided locations to find most accurate between these twos.
        Returns:
        Current @Location object of user/device.
